document.topic_text: Results expected in Zambian elections marred by pre-vote violence By Al Jazeera 12 Aug 2016 | 5:01 am | 2m 8s With voting counting now underway, results are expected late on Friday in Zambia's presidential and parliamentary elections. Share:
